forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 27. North wind 3 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 14. Northwest wind around 3 mph.

weather_report:
In Boston this afternoon, a bright and inviting sun reigns over the city, cloaked in a gentle breeze that promises to keep the chill at bay. The sky overhead is an uninterrupted expanse of blue, providing a canvas of clarity that hints at the crispness of the air. As we approach the evening, the temperature will find its way down to a cooler note, settling in around 14 degrees, enveloped by a comfortably light northwest wind. There is no trace of fog, just a simple serenity in the atmosphere, perfect for an afternoon stroll along the cobblestone streets or perhaps a quiet sit in one of the parks.

Dress warmly with layers; a sturdy coat, perhaps a soft scarf wrapped snugly around your neck, will invite comfort against the crisp winter air. It's an ideal time to savor a warm drink from a local café—maybe a rich hot chocolate or a spiced chai—for those who wish to bask in the cozy atmosphere, or simply to enjoy the sights of this storied city. As the day moves gently into night, the clarity persists, a farewell to the year beckoning one to reflect or engage in the serene quiet of the closing days. Whether you choose to wander or indulge in a peaceful moment, the day’s mild beauty is sure to leave an imprint on your heart.
